name: video-call-app
description: A lightweight WebRTC video call web app

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix video-call-next -- -p 3050" "set PORT=9050 && npm start --prefix signaling-server"
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm run install-client && npm run install-server
scripts.build: npm run install-client && npm run build-client
scripts.vercel-build: npm run install-client && npm run build-client
